title: New Holiday Fonts from House Industries
content:
JUST RELEASED! HOLIDAY FONTS FROM HOUSE INDUSTRIES: $140

With some holiday always around the corner, uber families, amateur  
display typefaces and overused system fonts are not going to help  
you make that looming design deadline. These three timeless gems  
plus the 48 festive icons will always be in season, so you wonâ€™t  
have to worry about picking through that endless type menu  
anymore.

[http://www.houseind.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20060129052048/http:/www.houseind.com/)

\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_

NEW FONT SEARCH UTILITIES

Although we’re sticking to the gray and black color scheme, we  
have joined the new millenium with some neat search features and  
two new drop down menus in our top bar that allow you to look at  
fonts by name as well as style. Now it is easier than ever for us  
to convince you that we have the perfect fonts for your next  
project.

\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_

EXCLUSIVE HOLIDAY CARDS: $15

Since weâ€™re doing a limited run, your hipster friends will think  
you looked high and low for these exclusive greeting cards. And  
look, this email landed right in your lapâ€”so all you need to do is  
part with a few bucks to completely avoid the greeting card aisle  
or those gold foil stamped extravaganzas sold by the up-market  
stationery companies.

[http://www.houseind.com/index.php?page=stationery](http://web.archive.org/web/20060129052048/http:/www.houseind.com/index.php?page=stationery)
author: paul d hunt : 18 October, 2005 - 7:51am

comments.content:
i just love House’s script fonts, theyre sooooooooo sexy. I’ve been fighting the urge to buy this set for a week now. Woke up this mornings with visions of Holiday Script dancing in my head: better’n’ plum puddin’!

\* \* \* \* \*

i couldn’t do it. i couldn’t resist any longer… :^P
